entry.title: Simple diagrams of convoluted neural networks
entry.summary:
Description

Neural networks are complicated, multidimensional, nonlinear array operations. How can we present them in a way that is clear, didactic and insightful? (Bonus points if it is beautiful as well!) I will present an overview of tools and techniques for visualizing whole networks and particular blocks, including my project …
entry.content:
Description

Neural networks are complicated, multidimensional, nonlinear array operations. How can we present them in a way that is clear, didactic and insightful? (Bonus points if it is beautiful as well!) I will present an overview of tools and techniques for visualizing whole networks and particular blocks, including my project (ASCII diagrams of Keras models) and proposing new solutions.
